title: Rich Dad Poor Dad (HINDI)
description: "Rich Dad Poor Dad" by Robert Kiyosaki contrasts the financial philosophies of his "rich dad" and "poor dad".

title: 7 Money Rules for Life (R) - How to Take Control of Your Financial Future
description: "7 Money Rules for Life" by Mary Hunt offers practical financial advice.

title: The Psychology Of Money
description: "The Psychology of Money" by Morgan Housel explores the complex relationship between human behavior and money.

title: Atomic Habits
description: "Atomic Habits" by James Clear explores the science of habit formation

title: The Startup's Guide to LinkedIn Lead Generation Mastery
description: This comprehensive eBook is tailored to startup's aiming to excel in B2B lead generation using LinkedIn.
